version_description: Once again, we've been working hard behind the scenes to improve the game for you!
We are back on track with the newest update bringing you again awesome content. So don't miss your train, and look what we have prepared for you.

We are back on track with the newest update bringing you again awesome content. So don't miss your train, and look what we have prepared for you.
In the new version several bugs were fixed including drop rate chances in Special Offers.
With the latest update we have improved the daily offer shop and we are adding new type of competition - Delivery challenge.
We have been working hard to improve the game and bring you the latest new features.
In this new version we have done UI changes to improve player experience.
In our latest version we bring you new features, including Halloween event (available from level 10) and special progression quests for the first two regions.

We are back on track with the newest update bringing you again awesome content. So don't miss your train, and look what we have prepared for you in our latest version:

- Competition 3
- UI changes to improve player experience
- Technical improvements of the game
- Several bug fixes

Introducing... the Construction Event! Help build a football stadium - new map, new trains, new challenge! See you inside?

▶ Available to players with level 10 or more!

Last Chance? Construction Event with new map and new trains ends on Feburary 10, 2020! See you inside?

▶ Don't miss out on the upcoming Valentine Competition starting on February 12, 2020 <3
▶ Get ready for the "City Airport Event" starting on Feburary 17, 2020
▶ Events and competitions are available to all players with level 10 or more!

▶ Don't miss out on the upcoming Valentine Challenge starting on February 12, 2020 <3
▶ Get ready for the "City Airport Event" starting on Feburary 17, 2020
▶ Events and Challenges are available to all players with level 12 or more!

Get ready for the St. Patrick's Event with a new map and new trains, starting on March 6, 2020! Available for all players with level 12.

The latest build also includes:
- Visual upgrade of the Sea Trade building and Warehouse
- Various minor bug fixes and improvements.
